body_html:
@SsnL I've tried this using the binary build. So I think this is not the same as #6873, but may be related to a problem reported in the forum.
@ylxie Could you please do the following things to locate the problem?
Change the flag /Z7 in setup.py and tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat into /ZI and build again. And then, try to capture the error using some JIT debuggers like Visual Studio.
